name: Avoid unused Application Engine (PeopleSoft)
description: List of Application Engines that are not called
output: List all the unreferenced PeopleSoft Application Engine
rationale: Dead code must be avoided, it makes source code less readable, and increases the maintenance cost.
remediation: Check that the artefacts are truly necessary, suppress them if they are not needed

technicalCriteria.name: ASCMM-MNT-20 - Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid inactive code blocks that can mistakenly be considered as active and that can hide the active code in noise

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of reuse requires more maintenance effort in order to propagate changes to all instances of duplicated code

Measure Element
Number of instances where a named callable control element or method control element is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a callable or method control element)

qualityStandards.name: Dead Code
qualityStandards.description: The software contains dead code, which can never be executed.

qualityStandards.name: Dead Code
qualityStandards.description: The software contains dead code, which can never be executed.
